section.class: s_text_image pt80 pb80 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1

div.p: Press a button and watch your desk glide effortlessly from sitting to standing height in seconds.
The minimum height is 65 cm, and for standing work the maximum height position is 125 cm.

section.class: s_text_image pt80 pb80 o_colored_level o_cc o_cc1

div.p: We pay special attention to detail, which is why our desks are of a superior quality.
Looking for a custom bamboo stain to match existing furniture? Contact us for a quote.

record.field: Warranty, issued to the purchaser of an article by its manufacturer, promising to repair or replace it if necessary within a specified period of time.
